ai-mil7.6.5:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the two fingerbreadths that he may have been taken by theft?”
ai-mil7.6.5:1.2_0: “Now with the fellows of Kākavaṇṇa, having gone to the pond on his way crown, he brought many glowings and so on.
ai-mil7.6.5:1.3_0: In the same way, the meditator who engages in malicious talebearing to shoot one side, the one who understands the wrong way should gather at the root of a wrong time.
ai-mil7.6.5:1.4_0: This is the first kind of two fingerbreadths.
ai-mil7.6.5:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, one is upset.
ai-mil7.6.5:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, there are those who enjoy retreat in the forest, the meditator’s delighting in retreat.
ai-mil7.6.5:2.3_0: this is the second great king.
ai-mil7.6.5:2.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.6.5:3.1_0: It’s when a mendicant truly understands: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ... “This is the cessation of suffering” ... “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.”
ai-mil7.6.5:4.1_0: The fifth enquiry is the fifth thing.
